channel.title: Portal help
channel.description: the portals i have on the server im coding only work when you are stood next to them and you click, when i was working with choob isle you could just click the portal and it would teleport you, on this you have to click it to walk over then clickit again t teleport you... how can i change it so you only need to clik it once?

item.title: Portal help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[code]i dont tihnk that string of code is the problem, because in my choob isle source it has
[coe]public void DoAction() {

viewTo(destinationX, destinationY);

switch (ActionType) {

case 1: // Object click 1
objectClick(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY, 0, 0, 1);
break;

case 2: // Object click 2
objectClick2(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY);
break;

case 3: // Object click 3
objectClick3(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY);
break;

default: // error
println_debug(“Error - unknown ActionType found”);
break;

}
}[/code]

and that still makes the character walk upto the portal then u gotta click the portal again to use it.
to give rep you gotta have 15 rep,

item.title: Portal help
item.dc:creator: @ZTR_Zac ZTR Zac
item.description:
@ZTR_Zac wrote:

give me a bit ill try and figure it out.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2008, 06:13:25 AM[/size][hr]ok i know how. Your server has been updated to make the player walk to the object before doing the actionto make it look professional. You dont want to completely erase this because then your server would look unprofessional. We want to modify the code.

Search for this:

objectClick(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY

This should show some code looking like this.


public void DoAction() {

 viewTo(destinationX, destinationY);

 switch (ActionType) {
 
  case 1: // Object click 1
  objectClick(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY, 0, 0, 1);
  break;

  case 2: // Object click 2
  objectClick2(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY);
  break;

  case 3: // Object click 3
  objectClick3(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY);
  break;

  default: // error
  println_debug("Error - unknown ActionType found");
  break;

 }
}

We want to change the code to ask: if the objects a portal
and then we wanna make it think: then were not gonna bother walking to it to do the action, im gonna do it right here right now.

To do this replace the above code with this.

[code]public void DoAction() {

viewTo(destinationX, destinationY);

switch (ActionType) {

case 1: // Object click 1
if(objectX == 3008){
} else {
objectClick(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY, 0, 0, 1);
}
break;

case 2: // Object click 2
if(objectX == 3008){
} else {
objectClick2(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY);
}
break;

case 3: // Object click 3
if(objectX == 3008){
} else {
objectClick3(destinationID, destinationX, destinationY);
}
break;

default: // error
println_debug(“Error - unknown ActionType found”);
break;

}
}[/code]
Change the 3008 to your protals x coord
Please backup your code before you try this because i haven’t tested it.

Read full topic
